oversized.userStory: As a user, I want to be reminded for my upcoming deadlines/ToDos so that I can stay on track with my work. Acceptance criteria: 1. The user should receive a notification when the deadline is approaching (customizable : 1 day before/2 hours before/etc.). 4. The user should receive a notification when the reminder time is reached/passed and the task still hasn't been completed. 5. The user should be able to see the list of upcoming deadlines in the app.

oversized.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to add people to each ToDo, so that I can collaborate with others on my work and make the tasks appear in their app. Acceptance criteria: 1. The user should be able to add existing users and external users (inviting them to sign-up to the app) via email to each ToDo. 2. The user should be able to see the list of people added to each ToDo. 3. The people added to a ToDo should be able to see the ToDo in their app. 4. The people added to a ToDo should be able to update its status (mark as ongoing, completed, etc.). 5. The people added to a ToDo should receive notifications for the ToDo's deadlines and reminders.

oversized.userStory: As a user, I want to have a calendar with my To-Do's where bullets appear at the time of their due date, so that I know where I stand on my schedule and I can organize my time better.
